definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
to be weary of/to be fed up with/tedious
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
not to mind taking all the trouble (idiom)/to take great pains/to be very patient
lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
there can never be too much deception in war/in war nothing is too deceitful/all's fair in war

sentences.english: "Dry line fed a line" quite often heard.
sentences.chinese: “幹一行厭一行”倒是常常聽見。

sentences.english: It requires no small talent to be a deciding bear.
sentences.chinese: 要成爲一個神憎鬼厭的人物，要有非同小可的才幹。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the optimal anaerobic and aerobic fermentation time .
sentences.chinese: 由實驗結果顯示可知四季春之有氧與厭氧醱酵時間。

sentences.english: Then two months into the semester, you begin to wonder why everything tastes so bad.
sentences.chinese: 兩個月後，你開始喫厭了，感到一切都是那麼難喫。

sentences.english: A big part of the problem is the central government's disinclination to spend money on solving it.
sentences.chinese: 一個重要的問題就是中央政府厭於花錢解決這件事。

sentences.english: Whom thine eyes woo as mine importune thee.
sentences.chinese: 儘管你追求他們而我討你厭。

definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
